a.title: Go to Leeton R-X School District

a.title: Eligible A+ Community Colleges & Technical Schools
a.span: Eligible A+ Community Colleges & Technical Schools

li.a: Eligible A+ Community Colleges & Technical Schools

span.style: font-family: Tahoma;
font-size: 24px;
font-size: 16px;

br.span: Dear Parents, Students and Community Members,

span.style: font-size: 11pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);

p.span: Everyday I go to work in an empty building, no staff and no students. I kept thinking I was one day closer to bringing everyone back so we could finish the year off strong. Unfortunately, our students will not be returning to our building to finish out this school year. I was informed today, like most of you, that Governor Parson ordered the closure of all K-12 schools until the end of this academic year. I cannot tell you how much this breaks my heart. Of course, I always want the safety of our students and staff to come first, but I desperately wanted to get our students and staff back to school.

span.style: background-color: transparent; font-size: 11pt; letter-spacing: 0.07px; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);

p.span: This is definitely a year that no one will forget. From our kindergarten students to our seniors, there were activities and moments that everyone was looking forward to. In the days to come, our teachers and administrators will continue to plan and organize some of those events. We will keep you posted as we receive more information. For now, know that we are all thinking of our students and hoping everyone stays safe and healthy.

span.style: background-color: transparent; font-size: 11pt; letter-spacing: 0.07px; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);

font-size: 11pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);
font-family: Tahoma; font-size: 24px; color: rgb(192, 0, 0);

font-size: 11pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);
font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; color: rgb(28, 30, 33);
font-family: Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; color: rgb(28, 30, 33);
font-size: 18px;

p.span: Leeton R-X School District will remain closed through the rest of the school year. We will continue serving meals every Monday through May 11, 2020.

span.style: font-size: 24px;
color: rgb(0, 0, 0);
font-size: 16px;;text-decoration: underline;
font-size: 14px; font-family: Roboto, "Lucida Grande", arial, sans-serif; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);

br.span: Our food service department will be in the building during school closure for COVID-19 making meals for any student that has signed up to receive meals. These free meals are available to all students ages 18 and younger.

span.style: font-weight: 700; font-size: 14px; font-family: Roboto, "Lucida Grande", arial, sans-serif; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);
font-size: 14px; letter-spacing: normal; text-align: center; font-family: Roboto, "Lucida Grande", arial, sans-serif; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);

br.span: If you have NOT signed up for meals and would like a "hot" lunch and breakfast for the next morning, please call the school office at 660-653-2301. These meals must be picked up between 11:00-11:30 each Monday in the back parking lot.

span.style: font-size: 14px; text-align: center; letter-spacing: 0.07px; font-family: Roboto, "Lucida Grande", arial, sans-serif; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);

br.span: Delivery is available to students that do not have parents at home that are capable and available to come to the school to pick up lunches. We have many volunteers helping with this project, however, in order for their safety as well, if you have the means to pick up meals, please do so.

span.style: font-size: 14px; letter-spacing: normal; text-align: center; font-family: Roboto, "Lucida Grande", arial, sans-serif; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);

br.span: You will receive enough meals for the week. Please bring a cooler if possible.

p.style: margin-bottom: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Roboto, "Lucida Grande", arial, sans-serif; letter-spacing: normal; text-align: center;

a.title: Athletics link opens in new window

span.style: font-size: 13px;
letter-spacing: 0.3px; font-family: latobold;

span.style: font-size: 12pt; background-color: transparent; font-style: italic; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: "Times New Roman"; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);

p.span: ​The Leeton R-X School District, nestled in the southeast corner of Johnson County is an outstanding place to send your children to school. District goals and student performance go hand-in-hand to reflect the many positive characteristics of both the school district and community that it serves. Small teacher to student ratio ensures children receive the attention and support they need to reach their academic potential. In 2018, Leeton Elementary was recognized for being a National Blue Ribbon School. Being only one of 349 schools recognized, we are truly honored to have received this prestigious award.

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-style: italic; white-space: pre-wrap; letter-spacing: 0.3px; font-family: "Times New Roman"; color: rgb(3, 10, 19);

p.span: A small school with a big heart for children, Leeton provides a variety of opportunities for students to advance both in and out of the classroom. Known for our dual credit programs, many of our high school students graduate with multiple college hours jump-starting their college careers. Internships and work studies allow students to experience a variety of fields before receiving a high school diploma. Come by and visit our school to see what we have to offer. We hope that you decide to be a part of our Leeton family.

span.style: font-size: 12pt; background-color: transparent; font-style: italic; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: "Times New Roman"; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);

font-size: 12pt; background-color: transparent; font-style: italic; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: "Times New Roman"; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);
span.strong: Leeton R-X School District - "Where Every Student Matters"
